TextContent.Heading: Further Information
TextContent.Text: Here you will find links to national and international institutions for consumer health protection and disease surveillance and prevention as well as helpful tools in this subject area. The list makes no claim to completeness. The BfR does not assume any responsibility for the contents of the Internet sites listed here.

Institutes.Title: Organizations and Institutes
Institutes.BVL: Federal Office of Consumer Protection and Food Safety (BVL)
Institutes.ECDC: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
Institutes.BMEL: Federal Ministry of Food and Agriculture (BMEL)
